Html:
Hi,

I'm very new to your NAudio Framework, but I'm surprised how easy programming seems compared to other frameworks like portaudio.

I read your tutorial 5 carefully, because I am interested in recording sounds from multiple sound sources, four in my case. Is it possible to do this? Can the WaveIn class handle more than two channels? I have a Maya Soundcard, that offers me the possibility to record from 4 sound sources.


Thank you in advance.

Hi,

I have never tried to record four inputs using NAudio. I suspect it would be down to whether the soundcard manufacturers have supported this for WaveIn. Give it a try and see what happens.

Mark
